vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.13;
son of: Reuel (H7467);
brother of: Nahath (H5184), Shammah (H8048) and Mizzah (H4199)
§ Zerah or Zarah = "rising"
1) a son of Reuel and grandson of Esau, one of the dukes of the Edomites
2) twin brother of Pharez, sons of Judah and Tamar; descendants are called Zarhites, Ezrahites, and Izrahites
3) son of Simeon; also called 'Zohar'
4) a Gershonite Levite, son of Iddo of Adaiah
5) the Ethiopian or Cushite, invader of Judah in the reign of Asa who defeated the invaders; probably the same as the Egyptian king Usarken I, second king of the Egyptian 22nd dynasty or perhaps more probably Usarken II, his 2nd successor
6) another Edomite leader; possibly same as 1
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   ocaso, caída (del sol); (2a)   hijo de Reuel, hijo de Esaú; (2b)   hijo de Judá y Tamar; hermano de Péres; (2c)   padre de Jobab, rey de Edom; (2d)   hijo de Simeón; (2e)   hijo de Idó; descendiente de Libní; tribu de Leví; (2f)   hijo de Adaías; ancestro de Asaf; tribu de Leví; (2g)   rey de Etiopía; en tiempos del rey Asá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
謝拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "升起"
1) 猶大和他瑪的兒子,法勒斯的雙生兄弟 (創 38:30);
後代被稱為謝拉族, 以斯拉人, 伊斯拉人
2) 流珥的兒子及以掃的孫子, 以東族的族長之一 (創 36:13-19)
3) 以東王, 可能與 2) 為同一人 (創 36:33)
4) 西緬的兒子 (代上 4:24); 也稱為"瑣轄" (創 46:10)
5) 一革順族的利未人, 易多的兒子 (代上 6:21)
6) 衣索匹亞或古實王, 在亞撒治下入侵猶大但被擊退 (代下 14:9);
或許就是埃及王 Usarken I , 埃及第二十二王朝的第二位王,
或更可能是 Usarken II, 他的第二繼承者
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
谢拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "升起"
1) 犹大和他玛的儿子,法勒斯的双生兄弟 (创 38:30);
后代被称为谢拉族, 以斯拉人, 伊斯拉人
2) 流珥的儿子及以扫的孙子, 以东族的族长之一 (创 36:13-19)
3) 以东王, 可能与 2) 为同一人 (创 36:33)
4) 西缅的儿子 (代上 4:24); 也称为"琐辖" (创 46:10)
5) 一革顺族的利未人, 易多的儿子 (代上 6:21)
6) 衣索匹亚或古实王, 在亚撒治下入侵犹大但被击退 (代下 14:9);
或许就是埃及王 Usarken I , 埃及第二十二王朝的第二位王,
或更可能是 Usarken II, 他的第二继承者

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.33;
father of: Jobab (H3103H)
§ Zerah or Zarah = "rising"
1) a son of Reuel and grandson of Esau, one of the dukes of the Edomites
2) twin brother of Pharez, sons of Judah and Tamar; descendants are called Zarhites, Ezrahites, and Izrahites
3) son of Simeon; also called 'Zohar'
4) a Gershonite Levite, son of Iddo of Adaiah
5) the Ethiopian or Cushite, invader of Judah in the reign of Asa who defeated the invaders; probably the same as the Egyptian king Usarken I, second king of the Egyptian 22nd dynasty or perhaps more probably Usarken II, his 2nd successor
6) another Edomite leader; possibly same as 1

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.38.30;
son of: Judah (H3063) and Tamar (H8559);
brother of: Perez (H6557);
half-brother of: Er (H6147), Onan (H0209) and Shelah (H7956);
father of: Zabdi (H2067), Ethan (H0387H), Heman (H1968H), Calcol (H3633H) and Dara (H1873); also called Izrahite at 1Ch.27.8;
§ Zerah or Zarah = "rising"
1) a son of Reuel and grandson of Esau, one of the dukes of the Edomites
2) twin brother of Pharez, sons of Judah and Tamar; descendants are called Zarhites, Ezrahites, and Izrahites
3) son of Simeon; also called 'Zohar'
4) a Gershonite Levite, son of Iddo of Adaiah
5) the Ethiopian or Cushite, invader of Judah in the reign of Asa who defeated the invaders; probably the same as the Egyptian king Usarken I, second king of the Egyptian 22nd dynasty or perhaps more probably Usarken II, his 2nd successor
6) another Edomite leader; possibly same as 1

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.21;
son of: Iddo (H5714H);
father of: Jeatherai (H2979)
§ Zerah or Zarah = "rising"
1) a son of Reuel and grandson of Esau, one of the dukes of the Edomites
2) twin brother of Pharez, sons of Judah and Tamar; descendants are called Zarhites, Ezrahites, and Izrahites
3) son of Simeon; also called 'Zohar'
4) a Gershonite Levite, son of Iddo of Adaiah
5) the Ethiopian or Cushite, invader of Judah in the reign of Asa who defeated the invaders; probably the same as the Egyptian king Usarken I, second king of the Egyptian 22nd dynasty or perhaps more probably Usarken II, his 2nd successor
6) another Edomite leader; possibly same as 1

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.14.9
§ Zerah or Zarah = "rising"
1) a son of Reuel and grandson of Esau, one of the dukes of the Edomites
2) twin brother of Pharez, sons of Judah and Tamar; descendants are called Zarhites, Ezrahites, and Izrahites
3) son of Simeon; also called 'Zohar'
4) a Gershonite Levite, son of Iddo of Adaiah
5) the Ethiopian or Cushite, invader of Judah in the reign of Asa who defeated the invaders; probably the same as the Egyptian king Usarken I, second king of the Egyptian 22nd dynasty or perhaps more probably Usarken II, his 2nd successor
6) another Edomite leader; possibly same as 1

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10;
son of: Simeon (H8095);
brother of: Jemuel (H3223), Jamin (H3226), Ohad (H0161), Jachin (H3199) and Shaul (H7586H); also called Zerah at Num.26.13,20; 2x27.11,13;
§ Zerah or Zarah = "rising"
1) a son of Reuel and grandson of Esau, one of the dukes of the Edomites
2) twin brother of Pharez, sons of Judah and Tamar; descendants are called Zarhites, Ezrahites, and Izrahites
3) son of Simeon; also called 'Zohar'
4) a Gershonite Levite, son of Iddo of Adaiah
5) the Ethiopian or Cushite, invader of Judah in the reign of Asa who defeated the invaders; probably the same as the Egyptian king Usarken I, second king of the Egyptian 22nd dynasty or perhaps more probably Usarken II, his 2nd successor
6) another Edomite leader; possibly same as 1
